appSelection.helperText: Du kan klistra in länkar eller ett app-ID och vi kommer att försöka hitta det
appSelection.notFound: Det gick inte att hitta spel med app-ID {{query}}. Detta kan hända om: Det har tagits bort från Steam-butiken, inte är listat som 'spel', eller inte är tillgängligt i ditt land.
appSelection.placeholder: Skriv in ett spels namn från ditt Steam-bibliotek...
appSelection.previousReportsExist: Du har tidigare rapporter för det här spelet
appSelection.runsNativeWarning: Spelet har en nativ Linux-version! Vänligen se efter så att du inte oavsiktligt har kört spelet nativt. Steam använder inte Steam Play för att köra det här spelet som standard, men [du kan tvinga den att göra det]({{link}}).

audioFaults.prompt: Upplevde du några problem med ljud?

borked.headline: Det var tråkigt!
borked.intro: Du kommer nu att fortsätta med att skicka in en kaputt rapport, men innan dess kanske du vill besöka vår [Spelfelsöknings FAQ]({{link}})-sida.

additionalNotes.label: Ytterligare detaljer
additionalNotes.placeholder: Förklaring eller länk till blogginlägg eller Github-arkiv

extra.prompt: Finns det något du vill lägga till som inte täcks av tidigare frågor?

graphicalFaults.prompt: Did you notice any graphical degradations? Lade du märke till några grafiska nedbrytningar?

graphicsApiSelection.prompt: Vilken grafik-API använde du i spelet?

controllerNotResponsive.long: Controller(s) detected but were not responsive

inputFaults.prompt: Did you experience any problems with your mouse, gamepad or other input devices?

installs.prompt: Were you able to install the game?

isImpactedByAntiCheat.prompt: Is the game impacted by anti-cheat software?

isMultiplayerImportant.prompt: Is multiplayer a crucial part of the value of this game?

launchFlagsUsed.prompt: Do you use any of these Proton launch flags?

launcher.prompt: How do you launch the game?

localMultiplayerAppraisal.prompt: How would you rate the local multiplayer functionality? Please evaulate for lag, connectivity or input issues, etc.

localMultiplayerAttempted.prompt: Did you try to play multiplayer locally (offline i.e. couch play)?

localMultiplayerPlayed.prompt: Were you able to get local multiplayer to work?

misc.answerRequiredWhenNotListed: Answered Required When Not Listed Is Chosen

acceptable.long: Acceptable. Moderate issues but can be struggled through.

excellent.long: Excellent. Did not experience any problems.

good.long: Good. Had infrequent issues but is overall playable.

weak.long: Weak. Its problems significantly impact the experience

onlineMultiplayerAppraisal.prompt: How would you rate the online multiplayer functionality? Please evaulate for lag, connectivity or input issues, matchingmaking failures etc.

onlineMultiplayerAttempted.prompt: Did you try to play multiplayer online?

onlineMultiplayerPlayed.prompt: Were you able to connect and play online multiplayer?

opens.prompt: Were you able to start up the game and view its initial menu?

performanceFaults.prompt: Did you experience unexpected slowness given your hardware?

notes: Is your system information up to date? You will need to go to your profile and provide your Steam information after a graphics driver update.
Have you selected the correct game? Some games have the same name as older versions i.e. GRID
Have you added descriptions in the right place? For example, write notes about graphics issues in that section rather than end notes.

prompts.continuingDraft: You are continuing from an automatically saved draft.
prompts.discardDraftWarning: All of your responses will be permanently discarded.

additionalNotes.label: Manual Proton Version
additionalNotes.placeholder: Must be valid Proton version string. Examples: {{examples}}

protonVersion.prompt: What version of Proton are you using?

errorLoading.long: Could not load a save game

saveGameFaults.prompt: Did you experience any problems with save games?

significantBugs.prompt: Did you experience any other significant bugs?

stabilityFaults.prompt: Did you experience any stability issues?

startsPlay.prompt: Were you able to begin playing?

intro: ProtonDB now buckets reports into two types: Steam Play and Tinker.
Use Steam Play Report to cover the out-of-the-box experience. Install, hit play, and get your game on.
Use Tinker Report if you have made tweaks or customizations to get the game working.
For more on the differences, see [this news post]({{link}}).
type.prompt: What type of report will you write?

additionalNotes.label: Summary (max {{count}} chars)
additionalNotes.placeholder: Add a short summary. This will be the headline of your report.

verdict.prompt: Would a typical gamer have an enjoyable experience running this game on Linux with Proton?

welcome.intro: Thanks for your interest in expanding ProtonDB's catalog of compatibility reports on Steam Play and Proton! Please keep in mind the following before you contribute
notes: These reports are published on ProtonDB pending review and used by other gamers, Valve, and developers to identify and fix games. Please keep your reports accurate, free of offensive language, and refrain from submitting reports just to promote your favorite game, distro or graphics card.

Submitting multiple reports for the same game is encouraged! As you play more or update Proton you'll have more to say. In this way ProtonDB differs from a wiki, since each report serves as a 'snapshot' of how the game played on that date with your configuration.
If you submit multiple reports, only your most recent will count towards the ProtonDB rating and only if your system information meets Proton's minimum requirements.
Your contributions will be publicly visible on ProtonDB and available in data exports under the Open Database License. Go [here]({{link}}) for more information.

switching.long: Could not conventionally escape from fullscreen (such as with Alt-Tab)

windowingFaults.prompt: Did you experience any problems with windowing or fullscreen?
